            FROM Events AS e
            ORDER BY e.Id ASC
            OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
        ) AS t

            FROM Attendances AS a
            INNER JOIN Users AS u ON a.UserId == u.Id

) AS [t]

    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (

) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Date], [t].[Location], [t].[Name], [t0].[Id], [t0].[EventId], [t0].[IsAttending], [t0].[UserId], [t0].[Id0], [t0].[Email], [t0].[Password], [t0].[Role], [t0].[Username]
FROM (
    SELECT [e].[Id], [e].[Date], [e].[Location], [e].[Name]
    FROM [Events] AS [e]
    ORDER BY [e].[Id]
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Id], [a].[EventId], [a].[IsAttending], [a].[UserId], [u].[Id] AS [Id0], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[Role], [u].[Username]
    FROM [Attendances] AS [a]
    INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [a].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t0].[Id]

    SELECT [e].[Id], [e].[Date], [e].[Location], [e].[Name]
    FROM [Events] AS [e]
    ORDER BY [e].[Id]
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Id], [a].[EventId], [a].[IsAttending], [a].[UserId], [u].[Id] AS [Id0], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[Role], [u].[Username]
    FROM [Attendances] AS [a]
    INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [a].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t0].[Id]

    ORDER BY [e].[Id]
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]

    SELECT [a].[Id], [a].[EventId], [a].[IsAttending], [a].[UserId], [u].[Id] AS [Id0], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[Role], [u].[Username]
    FROM [Attendances] AS [a]
    INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [a].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t0].[Id]

) AS [t]

) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]

    ORDER BY [e].[Id]
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]

    SELECT [a].[Id], [a].[EventId], [a].[IsAttending], [a].[UserId], [u].[Id] AS [Id0], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[Role], [u].[Username]
    FROM [Attendances] AS [a]
    INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [a].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t0].[Id]

) AS [t]

    SELECT [a].[Id], [a].[EventId], [a].[IsAttending], [a].[UserId], [u].[Id] AS [Id0], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[Role], [u].[Username]

    SELECT [e].[Id], [e].[Date], [e].[Location], [e].[Name]
    FROM [Events] AS [e]
    ORDER BY [e].[Id]
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Id], [a].[EventId], [a].[IsAttending], [a].[UserId], [u].[Id] AS [Id0], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[Role], [u].[Username]
    FROM [Attendances] AS [a]
    INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [a].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t0].[Id]

    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]

) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t0].[Id]

    ORDER BY [e].[Id]
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Id], [a].[EventId], [a].[IsAttending], [a].[UserId], [u].[Id] AS [Id0], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[Role], [u].[Username]
    FROM [Attendances] AS [a]

) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t0].[Id]

            FROM Events AS e
            ORDER BY e.Id ASC
            OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_0 ROWS ONLY

    ORDER BY [e].[Id]
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]

    SELECT [a].[Id], [a].[EventId], [a].[IsAttending], [a].[UserId], [u].[Id] AS [Id0], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[Role], [u].[Username]
    FROM [Attendances] AS [a]
    INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [a].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t0].[Id]

) AS [t]

) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]

    SELECT [e].[Id], [e].[Date], [e].[Location], [e].[Name]
    FROM [Events] AS [e]
    ORDER BY [e].[Id]
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Id], [a].[EventId], [a].[IsAttending], [a].[UserId], [u].[Id] AS [Id0], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[Role], [u].[Username]
    FROM [Attendances] AS [a]
    INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [a].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t0].[Id]

) AS [t]

) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]

    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]

) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t0].[Id]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Date], [t].[Location], [t].[Name], [t0].[Id], [t0].[EventId], [t0].[IsAttending], [t0].[UserId], [t0].[Id0], [t0].[Email], [t0].[Password], [t0].[Role], [t0].[Username]

    SELECT [e].[Id], [e].[Date], [e].[Location], [e].[Name]
    FROM [Events] AS [e]
    ORDER BY [e].[Id]
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Id], [a].[EventId], [a].[IsAttending], [a].[UserId], [u].[Id] AS [Id0], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[Role], [u].[Username]
    FROM [Attendances] AS [a]
    INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [a].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t0].[Id]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Date], [t].[Location], [t].[Name], [t0].[Id], [t0].[EventId], [t0].[IsAttending], [t0].[UserId], [t0].[Id0], [t0].[Email], [t0].[Password], [t0].[Role], [t0].[Username]
FROM (
    SELECT [e].[Id], [e].[Date], [e].[Location], [e].[Name]
    FROM [Events] AS [e]
    ORDER BY [e].[Id]
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Id], [a].[EventId], [a].[IsAttending], [a].[UserId], [u].[Id] AS [Id0], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[Role], [u].[Username]

    INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [a].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]

) AS [t]

) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]

    SELECT TOP(1) [e].[Id], [e].[Date], [e].[Location], [e].[Name]
    FROM [Events] AS [e]
    WHERE [e].[Id] = @__id_0
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Id], [a].[EventId], [a].[IsAttending], [a].[UserId], [u].[Id] AS [Id0], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[Role], [u].[Username]
    FROM [Attendances] AS [a]
    INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [a].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t0].[Id]

) AS [t]

) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t0].[Id]

) AS [t]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Date], [t].[Location], [t].[Name], [t0].[Id], [t0].[EventId], [t0].[IsAttending], [t0].[UserId], [t0].[Id0], [t0].[Email], [t0].[Password], [t0].[Role], [t0].[Username]
FROM (
    SELECT [e].[Id], [e].[Date], [e].[Location], [e].[Name]
    FROM [Events] AS [e]
    ORDER BY [e].[Id]
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Id], [a].[EventId], [a].[IsAttending], [a].[UserId], [u].[Id] AS [Id0], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[Role], [u].[Username]
    FROM [Attendances] AS [a]
    INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [a].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t0].[Id]

) AS [t]

    FROM [Events] AS [e]
    ORDER BY [e].[Id]
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_0 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Id], [a].[EventId], [a].[IsAttending], [a].[UserId], [u].[Id] AS [Id0], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[Role], [u].[Username]
    FROM [Attendances] AS [a]
    INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [a].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t0].[Id]

    ORDER BY [e].[Id]
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]

    SELECT [a].[Id], [a].[EventId], [a].[IsAttending], [a].[UserId], [u].[Id] AS [Id0], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[Role], [u].[Username]
    FROM [Attendances] AS [a]
    INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [a].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t0].[Id]

) AS [t]

) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Date], [t].[Location], [t].[Name], [t0].[Id], [t0].[EventId], [t0].[IsAttending], [t0].[UserId], [t0].[Id0], [t0].[Email], [t0].[Password], [t0].[Role], [t0].[Username]
FROM (
    SELECT [e].[Id], [e].[Date], [e].[Location], [e].[Name]
    FROM [Events] AS [e]
    ORDER BY [e].[Id]
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Id], [a].[EventId], [a].[IsAttending], [a].[UserId], [u].[Id] AS [Id0], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[Role], [u].[Username]
    FROM [Attendances] AS [a]
    INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [a].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t0].[Id]

    ORDER BY [e].[Id]
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Id], [a].[EventId], [a].[IsAttending], [a].[UserId], [u].[Id] AS [Id0], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[Role], [u].[Username]

) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Date], [t].[Location], [t].[Name], [t0].[Id], [t0].[EventId], [t0].[IsAttending], [t0].[UserId], [t0].[Id0], [t0].[Email], [t0].[Password], [t0].[Role], [t0].[Username]
FROM (
    SELECT [e].[Id], [e].[Date], [e].[Location], [e].[Name]
    FROM [Events] AS [e]
    ORDER BY [e].[Id]
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Id], [a].[EventId], [a].[IsAttending], [a].[UserId], [u].[Id] AS [Id0], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[Role], [u].[Username]
    FROM [Attendances] AS [a]
    INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [a].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t0].[Id]

SELECT [t].[Id], [t].[Date], [t].[Location], [t].[Name], [t0].[Id], [t0].[EventId], [t0].[IsAttending], [t0].[UserId], [t0].[Id0], [t0].[Email], [t0].[Password], [t0].[Role], [t0].[Username]
FROM (
    SELECT [e].[Id], [e].[Date], [e].[Location], [e].[Name]
    FROM [Events] AS [e]
    ORDER BY [e].[Id]
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [a].[Id], [a].[EventId], [a].[IsAttending], [a].[UserId], [u].[Id] AS [Id0], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[Role], [u].[Username]
    FROM [Attendances] AS [a]
    INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [a].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t0].[Id]

) AS [t]

) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]

            FROM Events AS e
            ORDER BY e.Id ASC
            OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
        ) AS t
        LEFT JOIN

) AS [t]

    SELECT [a].[Id], [a].[EventId], [a].[IsAttending], [a].[UserId], [u].[Id] AS [Id0], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[Role], [u].[Username]

) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]

    ORDER BY [e].[Id]
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]

    SELECT [a].[Id], [a].[EventId], [a].[IsAttending], [a].[UserId], [u].[Id] AS [Id0], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[Role], [u].[Username]
    FROM [Attendances] AS [a]

) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t0].[Id]

    ORDER BY [e].[Id]
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [t]

    SELECT [a].[Id], [a].[EventId], [a].[IsAttending], [a].[UserId], [u].[Id] AS [Id0], [u].[Email], [u].[Password], [u].[Role], [u].[Username]
    FROM [Attendances] AS [a]

) AS [t0] ON [t].[Id] = [t0].[EventId]
ORDER BY [t].[Id], [t0].[Id]
